def_en: If something is confined to a particular place, it exists only in that place. If it is confined to a particular group, only members of that group have it.

def_cn: (空间或面积)有限的，狭小的
def_en: A confined space or area is small and enclosed by walls.

def_cn: (因残疾或生病)受困于…的
def_en: If someone is confined to a wheelchair, bed, or house, they have to stay there, because they are disabled or ill.
